data.name: Closers: Character Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Take the plunge into Closers with a pile of useful gear, perks, and costumes, including a Steam-exclusive costume item!

The Character Starter Pack contains:

  • Han High School Uniform Weapon (2-Star)—Get the official weapon skin of Han High!
  • Han High School Uniform Hair (2-Star)—No Han High School costume is truly complete without the proper coif!
  • Han High School Uniform Top (2-Star)—If you’re going back to high school, make sure you blend!
  • Han High School Uniform Bottom (2-Star)—Because every high school has its dress code!
  • Han High School Uniform Gloves (2-Star)—Gloves might not be necessary...but they do look elegant!
  • Han High School Uniform Shoes (2-Star)—The dress code is surprisingly specific; wear the right shoes!
  • School Accessory Set (2-Star)—Contains a Han High School student satchel, Black Frames eyeglasses, and a UNION armband!
  • Elite Status Voucher (30 Day)—Get the most out of Closers with a month of elite status!
  • Fast Dual Recovery Capsule—Instantly recover 40% of your HP and MP!
  • Resurrection Capsule—If you fall down, you can get back up again!
  • Phase Stabilizer—Grants you a 100% experience bonus!
  • Luck Stabilizer—Grants you a 30% found item bonus!
  • Midnight Wings (3-Star, AAA-tuned) (30 Day)—A pair of onyx-black wings to make you look badass!
  • Color Contact Lens 4-Pack—Adjust your eye color with this Steam-exclusive item!

data.short_description: The Character Starter Pack is a virtual cornucopia of useful gear, perks, and costumes, including:Han High School Uniform Weapon (2-Star)Han High School Uniform Hair (2-Star)Han High School Uniform Top (2-Star)Han High School Uniform Bottom (2-Star)Han High School Uniform Gloves (2-Star)Han High School Uniform Shoes (2-Star)School Accesso

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
